languages.text: {n}Бородатый мужчина с бледной чуть ли не до прозрачности кожей, огромными синяками под глазами и кислой миной, которая будто бы въелась в его лицо, мрачно кивает.{/n} "Здравия желаю, Лорд-капитан. Вы на меня положитесь — наш корабль для меня что дом родной. Сам скорее подохну, чем дам чему-то с ним приключиться!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Бородатый мужчина с бледной чуть ли не до прозрачности кожей, огромными синяками под глазами и патологически кислой миной, будто бы застывшей на его лице, мрачно кивает.{/n} "Здравия желаю, Лорд-капитан. Вы на меня положитесь — наш корабль для меня что дом родной. Сам скорее подохну, чем дам чему-то с ним приключиться!"

languages.text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"
languages.original_text: {n}Бородатый мужчина с бледной чуть ли не до прозрачности кожей, огромными синяками под глазами и кислой миной, которая будто бы въелась в его лицо, мрачно кивает.{/n} "Здравия желаю, Лорд-капитан. Вы на меня положитесь — наш корабль для меня что дом родной. Сам скорее подохну, чем дам чему-то с ним приключиться!"

This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

{n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

languages.text: {n}这个长着胡子的男人皮肤苍白，几乎是透明的。他的双眼下面有两大块黑眼圈，阴沉的表情仿佛已经刻在了他的脸上。他闷闷不乐地点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，船长老大。这艘船就像我的家一样，所以放心吧，我会好好照顾她的。我就算是死，也不想让她受到任何伤害！”
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个长着胡子的男人皮肤苍白，几乎是透明的。他的双眼下面有两大块黑眼圈，阴沉的表情仿佛已经刻在了他的脸上。他闷闷不乐地点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，船长老大。这艘船就像我的家一样，所以放心吧，我会好好照顾她的。我就算是死，也不想让她受到任何伤害！”

languages.text: {n}ほとんど透明に近い青白い肌、目の下に大きなクマ、そして顔に刻み込まれたような気難しそうな表情をした髭面の男が、不機嫌そうにうなずいた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。この船は私にとって家も同然の場所です。ゆえにこそ、安心してお任せください。もしこの船を悲しませるようなことがあれば、私は生命を断つでしょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ほとんど透明に近い青白い肌、目の下に大きなクマ、そして顔に刻み込まれたような気難しそうな表情をした髭面の男が、不機嫌そうにうなずいた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。この船は私にとって家も同然の場所です。ゆえにこそ、安心してお任せください。もしこの船を悲しませるようなことがあれば、私は生命を断つでしょう！」

languages.text: {n}Der bärtige Mann hat blasse, fast durchsichtige Haut, große dunkle Augenringe und einen mürrischen Gesichtsausdruck, der fest eingemauert zu sein scheint. Er nickt missmutig.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Lord Captain. Dieses Schiff hier ist meine Heimat, Ihr könnt sicher sein, dass es in guten Händen ist. Ich sterbe lieber, als zuzulassen, dass ihm etwas zustößt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der bärtige Mann hat blasse, fast durchsichtige Haut, große dunkle Augenringe und einen mürrischen Gesichtsausdruck, der fest eingemauert zu sein scheint. Er nickt missmutig.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Lord Captain. Dieses Schiff hier ist meine Heimat, Ihr könnt sicher sein, dass es in guten Händen ist. Ich sterbe lieber, als zuzulassen, dass ihm etwas zustößt!"

languages.text: {n}L'homme barbu à la peau pâle, presque translucide, avec de larges cernes sous les yeux et une expression austère dont il ne semble jamais se départir, hoche la tête d'un air maussade.{/n} « Salutations, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce navire, c'est ma maison, alors vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il est entre de bonnes mains ! Plutôt mourir que de le mettre en danger ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme barbu à la peau pâle, presque translucide, avec de larges cernes sous les yeux et une expression austère dont il ne semble jamais se départir, hoche la tête d'un air maussade.{/n} « Salutations, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce navire, c'est ma maison, alors vous pouvez être {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il est entre de bonnes mains ! Plutôt mourir que de le mettre en danger ! »

languages.text: {n}El hombre, con barba, piel tan pálida que es casi transparente, grandes bolsas negras bajo sus ojos y una expresión severa que parece grabada en su rostro, asiente, taciturno.{/n} «Saludos, Lord Capi. Esta nave es prácticamente mi hogar, así que no se preocupe: está en buenas manos. ¡Antes palmo que dejar que le pase nada!».
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre, con barba, piel tan pálida que es casi transparente, grandes bolsas negras bajo sus ojos y una expresión severa que parece grabada en su rostro, asiente, taciturno.{/n} «Saludos, Lord Capi. Esta nave es prácticamente mi hogar, así que no se preocupe: está en buenas manos. ¡Antes palmo que dejar que le pase nada!».

languages.text: {n}Soluk ve neredeyse saydam tenli, gözlerinin altında büyük koyu halkalar olan ve suratsızlığı yüzüne yapışmış gibi görünen sakallı adam, somurtkan bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Selam olsun Lord Kaptan. Bu gemi benim evim gibidir, yani bilin ki emin ellerde. Ölürüm de başına bir iş gelmesine izin vermem!"
languages.original_text: {n}The bearded man with pale, almost transparent skin, large dark circles under his eyes, and a dour expression that seems hardwired into his face, gives a sullen nod.{/n} "Hail, Lord Cap'n. This here ship's as good as home to me, so rest assured she's in safe hands. I'll die before I let her come to any grief!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soluk ve neredeyse saydam tenli, gözlerinin altında büyük koyu halkalar olan ve suratsızlığı yüzüne yapışmış gibi görünen sakallı adam, somurtkan bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Selam olsun Lord Kaptan. Bu gemi benim evim gibidir, yani bilin ki emin ellerde. Ölürüm de başına bir iş gelmesine izin vermem!"
